categories.name: Battle Tactics
categories.description: Strategic gameplay and tactical decisions during the battle

criteria.name: Objective Control
criteria.description: Control objectives at the end of each turn

categories.name: Army Composition
categories.description: Quality and balance of army list

criteria.name: Balanced List
criteria.description: Well-balanced army composition with good unit variety

criteria.name: Good Sportsmanship
criteria.description: Exhibits good sportsmanship throughout the game

categories.name: Army Painting
categories.description: Quality of army painting and basing

criteria.name: Painted Army
criteria.description: Army is fully painted and based to a good standard

rubricJson.scoringNotes: Points are awarded based on performance in each category. Maximum score is 50 points. New category added for army painting.

notes: Initial rubric version for Age of Sigmar 4th Edition with new scoring system
